root.name: Doc Louis's Punch-Out!!
root.description: IntroductionDoc Louis's Punch-out!! is a Wiiware-exclusive game based on Punch-Out!!. It was one of the 2009 Club Nintendo gifts to club members that reached platinum status before June 30, 2009 in the U.S. and Canada. (The alternative gift was a life-size Mario hat.) In the game, Little Mac takes on his mentor, Doc Louis in a one on one bout. The game comes as a separate download and doesn't require ownership of the full retail version of the game.
